name: Baudouin
subtitle: Holy Ruffian
description: A freewheeling priest from the Order of Lua. He uses a holy explosion to protect the party, which heals allies and damages enemies at once.
story: As the most unlikely priest in the Church of Lua, Baudouin is, in a word, a maverick. Since childhood, he has always been a black sheep in the Church of Lua that emphasizes piety. He entered the church with the help of the High Priest Berman, but the religious life was painfully ill-suited for him. One day, however, he suddenly decided to quit his deviant ways, and started following the path of the high priesthood.

inn.idle: Whew, I see some quality wine in here! Another bottle for me, missy!

recruit.greet: Hey, whats up? You look pretty strong, eh?
talk: Stiff and stuffy isn't my style!
Oh, wanna brawl? I ain't gonna lose in a slugfest!
As god decrees, a man should live by his fist!
recruit.gift: Gahahaha, ain't you the generous one!! Sure, let's have a drink!

affinity.greet: This wild and unrestrained atmosphere! I love it!
talk: Violence should be met with violence! That's what the gods have said! Kwahahaha!
My friend! Let's have a drink!
affinity.gift: Kwahahaha, I'll give you Lua's blessing in return!

relationship.greet: Wow! Huh, you seem to be really blessed by the Goddess! You're practically shining!
talk: If I went to the Empire at that time...father, was I really right...
Eh, the Order of Lua isn't what you think it is, you know? God or not, it's still just a group of people.
There's one thing I want to say to you. Enjoy life while you can! You know, life is short! You don't want to regret anything!

uw.story: Even among the holy relics bestowed to the high priests of the Church of Lua, the God's Book Genesis is special. According to the legend, this book, guarded throughout the ages by the Grand Priests of the church, was written by Lua herself. Iris, the current Grand Priest, upon receiving a revelation regarding Baudouin, entrusted this book to his step father, Berman. Later, the book was given to Baudouin when he became a high priest. It is said that this divine relic provides infinite holy energy to its owner, along with the power to unlock the true potential of those who have faith.

ut.story: A wooden grail that has Goddess Lua's face engraved on it. When the people first learned of Lua's existence, they made a grail for her in praise of her divinity. As the civilization in Orbis Continent fell, the grail was also buried underground, and it's only been mentioned in records. However, on the day that Baudouin repented his sins and realized the truth of the holy book, this old grail appeared in front of him, shining like the sun.

ut.story: The last journal of a great teacher. It contains the treatment that Priest Berman carried out for Dark Plague patients, and his own battle with his illness. Baudouin managed to save this from the flames when they were burning the teacher's belongings after he died. Then, he transcribed it with Leo and named it Berman's Journal, which made a great contribution to Dark Plague treatment. The original journal is kept by Baudouin in safekeeping, reminding him of his teacher's will.
